events.message: I am filing a claim for a car accident that happened yesterday when my vehicle was rear-ended at a stoplight.
The claim has been reviewed and categorized as an auto accident related to a rear-end collision involving the insured vehicle.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage and guide the claim process for the reported car accident.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim concerning the vehicle collision and are initiating the necessary procedures immediately.
To proceed, please submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driver’s license copy as documentation.
The requested documents including the accident report, images of the damaged car, and a copy of the driver’s license have been provided.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and assessing the circumstances of the auto accident.
The investigation concerning your vehicle collision is complete, confirming liability and extent of damage as reported.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on the damage assessment and policy coverage for your car accident claim.
The customer has responded with satisfaction regarding the settlement proposal and expressed appreciation for the timely communication.
The claim is formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms for the vehicle accident repair costs.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to cover the repairs of the damage sustained in the car collision.
This claim is now officially closed after payment disbursal and customer confirmation of issue resolution.
The case file for this auto accident claim has been archived in our records for future reference.
